displacementBwd.MLFeatureShortDescription: A multidimensional array that stores the displacement vector from each joint to its parent.

heatmap.MLFeatureShortDescription: A multidimensional array that stores the confidence for each joint.

displacementFwd.MLFeatureShortDescription: A multidimensional array that stores the displacement vector from each parent joint to one of its children.

offsets.MLFeatureShortDescription: A multidimensional array that stores an offset for each joint.
